section.heading: Continuing education.
section.text: The Mayor shall establish by rule continuing-education requirements as a condition for renewal of the license to practice pharmaceutical detailing.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 26, 2008, D.C. Law 17-131, ยง 102(g), 55 DCR 1659

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 3-1205.10.
